boardGames.title: Scrabble
boardGames.description: A crossword game commonly played with English alphabets and words
boardGames.origin: Started by an architect named Alfred Mosher Butts in the year 1938
boardGames.alternateNames: Scrabulous (a version of the game on Facebook)

boardGames.title: Checkers
boardGames.description: Two players start with dark and light colored pieces. The pieces move diagonally.

boardGames.title: Chess
boardGames.description: A competitive board game played by two players. The current game has origins in an ancient game played in India, Chatrang

boardGames.title: Monopoly
boardGames.description: A board game draws inspiration from economics in real world

boardGames.title: Snakes and Ladders
boardGames.description: A board game, which is a race that needs players avoid snakes and get to ladders for reaching the target first.
